params.createDAOParams: Struct of all the parameters required to create a DAO
params.creator: Address of the Dao Creator

returns.accessControl: The address of the deployed access control proxy contract
returns.dao: The address of the deployed DAO proxy contract

params.interfaceId: An interface ID bytes4 as defined by ERC-165

returns._0: bool Indicates whether the interface is supported

createDAO(address,(address,address,addre.notice: Creates a DAO with an access control contract

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Returns whether a given interface ID is supported

userdoc.notice: A factory contract for deploying DAOs with an access control contract
